name: Control Robots
description:
At Control Enterprises, robots are built... using more robots! After many years of production, one little robot finally obtains self-consciousness, and decides to escape from the factory. However, its brand-new intelligence is not perfect, so it does not have a lot of control over its body...

Control Robots is a game where you help the awaken robot to escape from Control Enterprises -but each key shuffles its function constantly! The player needs to be fast adapting to the new situation, solving all the puzzles and reaching the end of the two levels!

How to play:

Initially, your controls are:

- Left / Right arrows: move

- Up arrow: jump

- Down arrow: cute robot noises.

- S: interact with PCs and call hook.

But these will be completely reshuffled as you play!

This game participates as a submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2020.  How does this game fit the theme?

- Mechanics: the robot has no control over itself. Keys used for actions change over time!

- Story: the robot is not anymore controlled by its owners! It has to go out of Control Enterprises.

Made with Godot Engine 3. Code is freely availabe on GitHub.
